name: nimbus/m-exploration
description:
Greedy frontier-based exploration algorithm
git: https://github.com/cognimbus/nimbus.library/tree/master/Library/Components/m-exploration
License: BSD

parameters.name: planner_frequency
parameters.description: Rate in Hz at which new frontiers will computed and goal reconsidered.

parameters.name: robot_base_frame
parameters.description: The name of the base frame of the robot. This is used for determining robot position on map. Mandatory.

parameters.name: costmap_topic
parameters.description: Specifies topic of source nav_msgs/OccupancyGrid. Mandatory.

parameters.name: costmap_updates_topic
parameters.description: Specifies topic of source map_msgs/OccupancyGridUpdate. Not necessary if source of map is always publishing full updates, i.e. does not provide this topic.

parameters.name: progress_timeout
parameters.description: Time in seconds. When robot do not make any progress for progress_timeout, current goal will be abandoned.

parameters.name: potential_scale
parameters.description: Used for weighting frontiers. This multiplicative parameter affects frontier potential component of the frontier weight (distance to frontier).

parameters.name: orientation_scale
parameters.description: Used for weighting frontiers. This multiplicative parameter affects frontier orientation component of the frontier weight. This parameter does currently nothing and is provided solely for forward compatibility.

parameters.name: gain_scale
parameters.description: Used for weighting frontiers. This multiplicative parameter affects frontier gain component of the frontier weight (frontier size).

parameters.name: transform_tolerance
parameters.description: Transform tolerance to use when transforming robot pose.

parameters.name: min_frontier_size
parameters.description: Minimum size of the frontier to consider the frontier as the exploration goal. In meters.

parameters.name: visualize
parameters.description: Specifies whether or not publish visualized frontiers.

inputStreams.name: map_updates
inputStreams.description: Incremental updates on costmap. Not necessary if source of map is always publishing full updates, i.e. does not provide this topic.

inputStreams.name: map
inputStreams.description: Map of the area on which the robot is doing the exploration on.

inputStreams.name: move_base_feedback
inputStreams.description: Feedback contains the current position of the base in the world.

inputStreams.name: move_base_result
inputStreams.description: Result is empty for the move_base action.

inputStreams.name: move_base_status
inputStreams.description: Provides status information on the goals that are sent to the move_base action.

outputStreams.name: move_base_cancel
outputStreams.description: A request to cancel a specific goal.

outputStreams.name: move_base_goal
outputStreams.description: A goal for move_base to pursue in the world.

outputStreams.name: finished_exploration
outputStreams.description: Flag that becomes true if the robot finished doing exploration.

outputStreams.name: frontiers
outputStreams.description: Visualization of frontiers considered by exploring algorithm. Each frontier is visualized by frontier points in blue and with a small sphere, which visualize the cost of the frontiers (costlier frontiers will have smaller spheres).
